name: §5§lDimensional Constraints§r
description:
§r§7While trapped in your pocket dimension, you cannot break blocks or change the world around you.§r

§7Your powers are limited in this sealed space.§r

badges.text: You cannot break or place blocks in the pocket dimension

entity_action.command: execute if entity @s[gamemode=!spectator, gamemode=!creative] run gamemode adventure @s
